name: Toy-Quest
description:
In Toy-Quest you create your hero by mixing the toys you have into your personalized hero with its own stats.

Controls:

  • Move with A/S/W
  • Attack with Spacebar
Credits:

Juan Franco Lagar

  • https://twitter.com/JuanFLagar1
  • https://www.linkedin.com/in/juan-franco-lagar-34b905196/

University of Applied Sciences Europe 

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied 

Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Games a Week"  (SummerSemester 2020)
